actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To establish United States-Brazil Joint Commission on Commerce and Trade, and for other purposes.
short_title: United States-Brazil Joint Commission on Commerce and Trade Act

summary.text: United States-Brazil Joint Commission on Commerce and Trade Act - Establishes the United States-Brazil Joint Commission on Commerce and Trade to address bilateral trade matters, seek removal of trade barriers, and promote commercial opportunities between the United States and Brazil.

titles.title: United States-Brazil Joint Commission on Commerce and Trade Act
To establish United States-Brazil Joint Commission on Commerce and Trade, and for other purposes.
